body_html:
Also just in case here are my WORKSPACE configs:

... for ndk14:

# Uncomment and update the paths in these entries to build the Android demo.
android_sdk_repository(
    name = "androidsdk",
    api_level = 23,
    build_tools_version = "27.0.3",
    # Replace with path to Android SDK on your system
    path = "/mnt/g/AndroidSdkLinux",
)

android_ndk_repository(
    name="androidndk",
#    path="/mnt/g/AndroidSdk/ndk-bundle",
    path="/mnt/g/AndroidSdkLinux/android-ndk-r14b",
    api_level=14
)

... for ndk12

# Uncomment and update the paths in these entries to build the Android demo.
android_sdk_repository(
    name = "androidsdk",
    api_level = 23,
    build_tools_version = "27.0.3",
    # Replace with path to Android SDK on your system
    path = "/mnt/g/AndroidSdkLinux",
)

android_ndk_repository(
    name="androidndk",
    path="/mnt/g/AndroidSdkLinux/android-ndk-r12b",
    api_level=14
)

body:
Also just in case here are my WORKSPACE configs: 

... for ndk14: 

```
# Uncomment and update the paths in these entries to build the Android demo.
android_sdk_repository(
    name = "androidsdk",
    api_level = 23,
    build_tools_version = "27.0.3",
    # Replace with path to Android SDK on your system
    path = "/mnt/g/AndroidSdkLinux",
)

android_ndk_repository(
    name="androidndk",
#    path="/mnt/g/AndroidSdk/ndk-bundle",
    path="/mnt/g/AndroidSdkLinux/android-ndk-r14b",
    api_level=14
)

```
... for ndk12

```
# Uncomment and update the paths in these entries to build the Android demo.
android_sdk_repository(
    name = "androidsdk",
    api_level = 23,
    build_tools_version = "27.0.3",
    # Replace with path to Android SDK on your system
    path = "/mnt/g/AndroidSdkLinux",
)

android_ndk_repository(
    name="androidndk",
    path="/mnt/g/AndroidSdkLinux/android-ndk-r12b",
    api_level=14
)
```
